page.title: 07NEWCOMERS
page.content: We interviewed three people who are newcomers to the village. Their names are Mrs Smith, who is middle aged, married and is a housewife. Also there is Mrs. Allies. She is a housewife and is married with four children. Her husband is a local councillor. Mrs.Bennett is young, married and a housewife. She has one child. Her husband has almost rebuilt their house because it was almost derelict when they moved in. Mrs. Smith has been living in the area for three years. Her house is about twenty years old. She likes the area very much. She thinks it's peaceful and easy for getting to town. She does'nt mind the country smells. She would like to have a library and a village shop. She thinks the housing estates are cramped and very lonely.
